title: Graphic Designer
description: Create UI Designs for multiple devices and purposes
qualifications: Bachelors in Design from a premier institute. Hands on work experience on Designing Tools like Figma.

title: Social Media Executive
description: Handle social media channels of public figures and brands.
qualifications: Should Have passed high school. Previous Experience of handling social media with large number of followers.

title: Data Analyst
description: Explore data and extract meaningful information from it.
qualifications: Bachelors in any field. Hands on experience of data analytics tools like Excel,PowerBI

title: Content Writer
description: Create blogs on categories including but not limited to Entertainment,Science,Tech.
qualifications: Previous Experience of writing blogs on Wordpress etc. Should have good written english with excellent vocabulary.

title: Customer Support Representativw
description: Handle customer queries and resolve their issues and provide solutions.
qualifications: Good Spoken English with ability to explain things clearly. Must have graduated High School.

title: Backend Developer
description: Handle entire backend infrastructure of Software Products.
qualifications: Bachelors in Technology in Computer Related Field. Hands on work experience on Technologies like Express,MongoDB and knowledge of entire CI/CD Pipeline.
